

```{r}
library(dplyr)
customers <- data.frame(
  customer_id = c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5),
  customer_name = c('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie', 'David', 'Eve')
)
orders <- data.frame(
  order_id = c(101, 102, 103, 104),
  customer_id = c(1, 1, 2, 3),
  product_name = c('Laptop', 'Phone', 'Tablet', 'Monitor')
)
customer_orders_left <- left_join(customers, orders, by = "customer_id")
print(customer_orders_left)

```
